column3: $infield shifted for Chase Utley and Ryan HowardFILENAME_TX"
$Chase Utley homers in his first World Series at bat2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$the latest start in World Series history after a 1:31 rain delay before game2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$pitcher Jamie Moyer scooped the ball with his glove and flipped it to 1B, where Ryan Howard caught it with his bare hand2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$the Rays use a five-man infield by bringing Ben Zobrist in from RF to stand at second base2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$the grounder rolled about 60 feet down the 3B line; Evan Longoria's throw was too high to catch and too late to get Eric Bruntlett2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$Joe Blanton is the 15th pitcher to hit a homer in the World Series, the last being Ken Holtzman in 19742008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$Jimmy Rollins fought with the rain and gusting wind trying to catch the ball2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"

$game suspended due to heavy rain and winds at 10:39 PM; resumed at 8:40 on 10/29; the first suspension in World Series history; temperature at the time of the resumption was 44 but it was dry2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$Chase Utley pump-faked to 1B and then threw to HP2008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
$the game, which started on 10/27 at 8:30, ended on 10/29 at 9:592008WS.EVE.post.comment.csv"
